narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This first pre-license Inspection for a Class C license and exit briefing were conducted with the facility owner. 
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Please send your license fee to:
USDA Animal Care 
2150 Centre Ave. 
Building B, Mailstop 3W11 
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
